---
title: "scaling data"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)

graph<- read.csv("graph.csv")
```

```{r}
graph$size <- as.factor(graph$size)

ggplot(graph, aes(x = size,
                  y = log(time.ns),
                  color = algo))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_line(linewidth = 1, aes(group = algo))+
  labs(title = "Time difference between 3 different algorithm",
       x = "Array size",
       y = "log(Time/ns)")+
  scale_x_discrete(labels = c("100", "1000", "10000","100000","1000000"))
```
